Articles.Content: How do I see the stats that tells me my height, my altitude, and my vertical and horizontal speed (the stuff at the top of the screen).
I'm sorry but I don't understand your question. Are you not seeing that stuff at the top of the screen?
Most youtubers have KER, which displays that info at the top of the screen, which I assume that is what you mean. In that case, the solution is to get KER.
tysm I was wondering what it was
